title: Report for zkMega v0.1（original Megaclite v0.1 )
description: 5 weeks ago, Patract Hub applied a treasury proposal #24 for Megaclite v0.1. Megaclite project will be dedicated to introducing basic zero-knowledge proof underlying support for the Polkadot ecology, so that developers can easily develop applications at the upper level through WASM smart contracts or Runtime.
